item.title: Arista basic ISIS-SR
item.description: ISIS Segment routing basics for Arista EOS References: https://www.arista.com/en/um-eos/eos-section-35-3-is-is-segment-routing SRGB Segment Routing Golbal Block Prefix-SID It’s global and unique. It identify a prefix. It’s called anycast SID when it’s send by a group of router. Node-SID It’s global and unique. Only one per node. It identify the node. Adjacent-SID It’s local and can use a dynamique range. It’s used to identify an interconnection between 2 nodes. With Arista EOS 4.23 it’s automaticaly allocated from the isis dynamic range show mpls label ranges.
